cast.name: 弗里·J·史密斯 Forrie J. Smith
大卫·米德桑德 David Midthunder

this_title: At the End of the Santa Fe Trail
introduction: The true story of Sister Blandina Segale, a young and innocent nun sent by the Catholic Church to the western territories in 1872. At a time when lawlessness and brutality were in the norm; surrounded by cowboys, Native Americans, outlaws, and new immigrants from all over the world. Sister Blandina displays courage, tough-mindedness, and a deep religious faith in service to the less fortunate.
chinese_title: At the End of the Santa Fe Trail
